docs.snippet: New Yorkers express outrage over the fatal shooting of two police officers over the weekend, as Mayor De Blasio calls on the public to put politics aside as families mourn. Vanessa Johnston reports....

headline.main: New Yorkers "disgusted" after two NYPD officers are shot and killed
headline.sub: New Yorkers "disgusted" after two NYPD officers are shot and killed

docs.lead_paragraph: New Yorkers express outrage over the fatal shooting of two police officers over the weekend, as Mayor De Blasio calls on the public to put politics aside as families mourn. Vanessa Johnston reports.

docs.snippet: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio says the killing of two police officers was an attack on New York City itself and calls on the public to report any threats against police. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.main: NY mayor calls on public to "step forward" if they know of police under threat
headline.sub: NY mayor calls on public to "step forward" if they know of police under threat

docs.lead_paragraph: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio says the killing of two police officers was an attack on New York City itself and calls on the public to report any threats against police. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: The Polar Express didn't quite have the steam it needed to reach the North Pole. It couldn't even make it out of Rhode Island....

headline.main: Polar Express Trip Cut Short After Train Breaks
headline.print_headline: Polar Express Trip Cut Short After Train Breaks

docs.lead_paragraph: The Polar Express didn't quite have the steam it needed to reach the North Pole. It couldn't even make it out of Rhode Island.

docs.snippet: Interest rates on short-term Treasury bills rose in Monday's auction with rates on six-month bills climbing to their highest level in more than two years....

headline.main: Rates Rise at Weekly US Treasury Bill Auction
headline.print_headline: Rates Rise at Weekly US Treasury Bill Auction

docs.lead_paragraph: Interest rates on short-term Treasury bills rose in Monday's auction with rates on six-month bills climbing to their highest level in more than two years.

docs.snippet: Cigar aficionados in the U.S. and cigar-makers in Cuba are looking forward to the export of famed Cuban cigars. Gavino Garay reports....

headline.main: Cigar rollers in Havana thrilled with warming U.S.-Cuba policy
headline.sub: Cigar rollers in Havana thrilled with warming U.S.-Cuba policy

docs.lead_paragraph: Cigar aficionados in the U.S. and cigar-makers in Cuba are looking forward to the export of famed Cuban cigars. Gavino Garay reports.

docs.snippet: A North Korean diplomat is accusing Western nations on the United Nations Security Council of "turning a blind eye" to acts of torture and spying by the United States and focusing only on human rights violations in his country....

headline.main: NKorea Accuses UN of Discussing Its Rights, Not US Torture
headline.print_headline: NKorea Accuses UN of Discussing Its Rights, Not US Torture

docs.lead_paragraph: A North Korean diplomat is accusing Western nations on the United Nations Security Council of "turning a blind eye" to acts of torture and spying by the United States and focusing only on human rights violations in his country.

docs.snippet: Nearly half of Americans believe Sony Pictures made the wrong decision by canceling the theatrical release of the comedy "The Interview," the film that provoked a cyberattack on the studio, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Monday....

headline.main: More Americans Disapprove of Sony Film Cancellation: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: More Americans Disapprove of Sony Film Cancellation: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly half of Americans believe Sony Pictures made the wrong decision by canceling the theatrical release of the comedy "The Interview," the film that provoked a cyberattack on the studio, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Monday.

docs.snippet: November existing home sales disappointed, but experts say November is an aberration. Housing market will grow in 2015. - Shartia Brantley reports...

headline.main: November home sales dip, but decline seen not critical
headline.sub: November home sales dip, but decline seen not critical

docs.lead_paragraph: November existing home sales disappointed, but experts say November is an aberration. Housing market will grow in 2015. - Shartia Brantley reports

docs.snippet: A mall shopper shot and killed a 16-year-old boy who attempted a robbery on the sidewalk outside, possibly in pursuit of a pair of limited-edition athletic shoes, police in southwest Ohio said Monday....

headline.main: Police: Teen Shot Over Possible Athletic-Shoe Envy
headline.print_headline: Police: Teen Shot Over Possible Athletic-Shoe Envy

docs.lead_paragraph: A mall shopper shot and killed a 16-year-old boy who attempted a robbery on the sidewalk outside, possibly in pursuit of a pair of limited-edition athletic shoes, police in southwest Ohio said Monday.

docs.snippet: Felix Neureuther became the most successful German skier in the men’s World Cup with his 10th career victory in a slalom in Madonna di Campiglio on Monday....

headline.main: Neureuther Leads German One-Two in Last Slalom of 2014
headline.print_headline: Neureuther Leads German One-Two in Last Slalom of 2014

docs.lead_paragraph: Felix Neureuther became the most successful German skier in the men’s World Cup with his 10th career victory in a slalom in Madonna di Campiglio on Monday.
